alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 08 at 2:55AM PDT until October 08 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Areas of dense fog are expected to expand overnight. Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog can be expected across portions of the LA metro area. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Beaches and Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Very low visibility will create dangerous driving conditions, especially for motorists driving on the Pacific Coast Highway and the 10, 105, 110, 405, 605, and 710 freeways.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles
